channel.title: Mohamed Fawas T
channel.description: Recent content on Mohamed Fawas T

item.title: Favourite qoutes from the books I read
How to prepare for MSc data science/ data analytics entrance exams
item.description: Nowadays there are many colleges providing data science courses. But to get admission to prestigious institutes you need to clear their entrance exam with a good rank. I myself was able to successfully clear the entrance test of IIITM-k (currently known as Digital University of Kerala). So, here I will explain some of the resources you can use to successfully clear the MSc data analytics/ data science entrance exams of DUK and CUSAT.

item.title: Free and quality resources to learn data science for a complete beginner
item.description: Many free and paid resources are available online to learn data science-related topics. Here I will describe some of the freely available content in online which I myself had used and found good. So I will divide this learning plan into two levels. ie, level A and B. Level A As a complete beginner, you should learn two things to improve your basics. Basic statistics used in data science A programming language used in the data science domain Learning statistics For learning statistics concepts I would recommend the youtube playlist provided by Josh Starmer.

item.title: Creating a Bank assistant chatbot using RASA framework
item.description: Created a Bank assistant chatbot using the RASA framework. Click here to see the project report

item.title: Project Demand of Products at a Retail Outlet Based on Historical Data
item.description: Developed a forecasting system with the help of ARIMA models and facebook’s prophet library. This forecasting system is used for predicting the demand for products at a retail outlet based on historical data. Click here to see the project report

item.title: Research study and implementation of FastSK : Text classification Algorithm
item.description: A study on FastSK Algorithm done as a part of mini-project during the second semester under the guidance of Dr.Asharaf and under the mentorship of Mr.Nikhil V Chandran Click here to see the project report

item.title: About Mohamed Fawas
item.description: What I am doing now I have completed my post graduation in Computer Science with specialization in Data Analytics from Indian Institute of Information Technology and Management - Kerala, currently known as Digital University of Kerala . I’m looking to collaborate on data engineering project. My Background Work Experience full time AI/ML intern at Reflections Info Systems PVT LTD February 2022 to present part time AI/ML intern at Reflections Info Systems PVT LTD August 2021 to December 2021 Education MSc Computer Science with specialization in Data Analytics from Indian Institute of Information Technology and Management - Kerala (currently known as Digital University of Kerala), where I was advised by Dr.
